welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rio Branco, Brazil! Get ready to experience the unique blend of Amazonian culture, vibrant street art, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Parrillada Tacuarí
restaurants.description: Parrillada Tacuarí is a bbq joint located in Río Branco.
restaurants.address: Virrey Agredindo, 1009, Río Branco Cerro Largo
